item.title: portfolio
item.dc:creator: amar
item.content:encoded:
Do you know me?

👋 im Amar Pawar

in addition to all the branding and marketing features and benefits, my clients get to enjoy the advantages of a time-tested and refined workflow that is custom-tailored to each project!

Contact me

Ethical Hacking

I have foundational knowledge in ethical hacking and cybersecurity, specializing in penetration testing, vulnerability assessment, and network security. Proficient in tools like Metasploit and Nmap, I participate in Capture the Flag (CTF) competitions to enhance my skills

web Development

I have comprehensive knowledge of WordPress, including theme and plugin development, site optimization, security, and customization. I am adept at creating and managing dynamic, user-friendly websites tailored to various needs.

Software Development

I have comprehensive knowledge in software development, including front-end (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React) and back-end (PHP, Python, Node.js, MySQL) technologies. Experienced with WordPress, web security, version control (Git), testing, debugging, and performance optimization.

Microsoft Office

I possess a strong understanding of Microsoft Office applications, including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook. I can confidently create and edit documents, spreadsheets, presentations, and manage email effectively.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: amar
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: amar
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://amarportfolio.42web.io.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: the four page
item.dc:creator: amar
item.content:encoded:
Do you know me?

👋 im Amar Pawar

in addition to all the branding and marketing features and benefits, my clients get to enjoy the advantages of a time-tested and refined workflow that is custom-tailored to each project!

Contact me

ABOUT ME

PERSONAL INFO

  • First Name : Amar
  • Last Name : Pawar
  • Age : 17Years
  • Nationality : india
  • Freelance : Available
  • Address : Maharashtra,Solapur
  • Phone : +91 8275469075
  • Email : amar01pawar80@
  • Language : English
DOWNLOAD CV YEARS OF EXPERIENCE 0 + COMPLETED PROJECTS 0 + Internship 0 + AWARDS WON 0 +

MY SKILLS

HTML 0% JAVA 0% CSS 0% PHP 0% WORDPRESS 0% SQL 0% PYTHON 0% C 0% MySql 0% Github 0% Git 0% MongoDB 0%

EXPERIENCE & EDUCATION

  • WEB DEVELOPER

    With a year of web development experience, you've likely built a solid foundation in the core technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for building websites.

  • website animation

    Show drafts volume_up With a year of web development experience under your belt, you've built a solid foundation in the core technologies and gained expertise in website animation

  • Power BI

    I have experience working with Power BI, a powerful tool for data visualization and analysis. This allows me to transform raw data into actionable insights and create interactive dashboards and reports.

  • B.C.A. CGPA -

    At Bharati Vidyapeeth (Deemed to Be Unversity)

  • XII 60.00%

    Maharashtra State Board (Pune Divisional)

  • (2009) Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisi cing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut abore et dolore magna

MY SERVICES

Ethical Hacking

I have foundational knowledge in ethical hacking and cybersecurity, specializing in penetration testing, vulnerability assessment, and network security. Proficient in tools like Metasploit and Nmap, I participate in Capture the Flag (CTF) competitions to enhance my skills

web Development

I have comprehensive knowledge of WordPress, including theme and plugin development, site optimization, security, and customization. I am adept at creating and managing dynamic, user-friendly websites tailored to various needs.

Software Development

I have comprehensive knowledge in software development, including front-end (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React) and back-end (PHP, Python, Node.js, MySQL) technologies. Experienced with WordPress, web security, version control (Git), testing, debugging, and performance optimization.

Prompt Engineering

I understand the art of crafting effective prompts to guide large language models. This allows me to unlock their full potential for various tasks like writing, translating, and answering questions.

Microsoft Office

I possess a strong understanding of Microsoft Office applications, including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook. I can confidently create and edit documents, spreadsheets, presentations, and manage email effectively.

Graphic Designer

possess a strong understanding of graphic design principles, allowing me to create visually impactful and effective designs for various purposes. This includes logo creation, branding, user interface design, and staying current with design trends.

item.title: Development In Gemini
item.dc:creator: amar
item.content:encoded:
There are several exciting new developments in the world of Gemini, depending on which aspect you're interested in:

Gemini Apps:

  • Advanced Trading Mode on Mobile: Now available on the mobile app, this feature brings advanced functionalities like enhanced trading pair discovery and new order types, offering a more sophisticated mobile trading experience.
  • Expanded Language Support: The Gemini mobile app is now available in more languages, including Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Portuguese, and more, making it more accessible to a wider audience.
  • New Data Analysis Capabilities: Gemini 1.5 Pro, available to Advanced subscribers, now offers improved data analysis capabilities, allowing for deeper insights and understanding.

item.title: Which Technology Is Relaces Today
item.dc:creator: amar
item.content:encoded:
The technology landscape is constantly evolving, so it's hard to pinpoint a single technology as "realce" today. However, several areas are experiencing significant advancements and gaining traction:

Artificial Intelligence (AI):

  • Generative AI: AI models like GPT-4 and DALL-E 2 are pushing boundaries in generating realistic and creative text, images, and videos.
  • AI-powered applications: AI is being integrated into various applications, from healthcare and finance to customer service and marketing.
  • Quantum computing: While still in its early stages, quantum computers hold the potential to revolutionize fields like drug discovery, materials science, and financial modeling.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: amar
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Most Powerfull Chatbot
item.dc:creator: amar
item.content:encoded:
ChatGPT: OpenAI's ChatGPT is a powerful language model known for its ability to generate realistic and creative text formats. It excels in tasks like writing different kinds of creative content, translating languages, and answering your questions in an informative way.

Microsoft Bing AI: This chatbot offers a combination of online search, text generation, and image generation capabilities. It can access and process information from the real world, making it versatile for various tasks.

Google Gemini: Integrated with Google services, Gemini provides powerful AI capabilities for search, chat, and access to AI hardware for cloud customers. It's constantly evolving and offers a user-friendly experience.
